artist: Artist: Ōkura Kōtō; Publisher: Kimura Toyokichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban hexaptych; chaotic naval battle scene rendered across six sheets to form a single image; black sky and blue, turbulent waters; scattered beams of lights in sky and on water; billowing plumes of white smoke, some with explosions throughout; scattered white specks of ash across image
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of the Great Naval Battle Outside the Harbor of Port Arthur
